Description: White painted pottery reis shabti of It-ntr P3-di-Imn with black detail: a striated lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a summarily modelled face with traced features and one arm held across the waist in relief holding a whip; the triangular apron is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
